column4: I have a HP pavilion a705w, the processor is a 2.93 ghz intel celeron (R) and it wont install ubuntu, why? It gets to the beggining at booting the kernel (right after you click start) and it just kills the pc, and reboots.. helpy?
there are 3 supported arch by ububtu : x86, a64 and ppc
I might suggest to turn off acpi
that url was for you too
there are switches on th bottom : F1, F2 ....
don'ti forget to disable acpi in your grub.conf after install
